title: Bloomberg Markets: Blue Apron Shares Worth Less Than Meals
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Blue Apron Shares Worth Less Than Meals
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jing Cao Techology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how in less than two months after going public, Blue Apron Holdings Inc.’s shares have fallen almost 50 percent to about $5 -- less than the price of one of its meals -- as the company struggles to persuade investors that it can win the hearts of America’s cooks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
